    FloatArray2DScaleOctave
    single octave of a discrete FloatArray2DScaleSpace

    This class is optimized for the Difference Of Gaussian detector used in David Lowe's SIFT-algorithm \citep{Loew04}.

    Model
    Abstract class for arbitrary geometric transformation models to be applied to points in n-dimensional space.

    keeps local coordinates final, application of a model changes the world coordinates of the point
